Parameters.Name: DEVICE-11-1-7 GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Parameters.Description: To verify Get Services and Device Management Service Capabilities consistency

Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features All steps are true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-7 GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Device service information STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get service capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Parse Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Compare Capabilities STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: No response on the first request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns no response on the first request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-7 GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: No response on the second request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY test when DUT returns no response on the second request.

DEVICE-11-1-7 GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY

Test.Name: Fault on the first request

DEVICE-11-1-7 GET SERVICES AND GET DEVICE SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
